deploy.startCommand: python manage.py check --deploy && python manage.py migrate --noinput && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && gunicorn byn.wsgi:application --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT --workers 3 --timeout 180 --max-requests 1000 --max-requests-jitter 100

build.buildCommand: pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt
